property.name: Attr1
property.value: Each character summons and encounters a Buccaneer henchman. If you defeat your Buccaneer, the barrier is defeated; otherwise, it is undefeated. After you act, summon and encounter a Buccaneer henchman.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, each character at your location is dealt 1d4 Fire damage. If undefeated, each character at your location is dealt 2d4+1 Fire damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, you may move any number of characters at your location to a location of your choice. If undefeated, you are dealt 2d4 Combat damage and moved to a random other location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: You may not play spells that have the Attack trait. Before you act, the Cannon Golem deals 1d4+1 Structural damage to your ship. If undefeated, the Cannon Golem deals 1d4+4 Ranged Combat damage to each character at a random other occupied location. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, recharge 2 cards, then summon and encounter a random ship. After you act, the Chelish Marine Captain delas 1d4+1 Structural damage to your ship. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Draugr Captain is immune to the Mental, Poison, and Swashbuckling traits. Before you act, recharge all but 1 card in your hand; then draw as many cards as you recharged. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Drowning Devil is immune to the Fire and Poison traits. Before you act, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 14 check or you may not play spells that have the Attack trait. After you act, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 10 check or bury the top 1d4 cards of your deck. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Magaav Assassin is immune to the Fire and Poison traits. Before you act, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 13 check or you may not play spells that have the Attack trait. When you are dealt damage and would discard cards, bury them instead. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, Paralictor Valeria Asperixus deals 1d4 Combat damage to you. If the check to defeat has the Fire or Mental trait, the difficulty is increased by 5. If Valeria would be defeated, reroll the dice. She is defeated or undefeated based solely on the results of the second die roll. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Wereshark Pirate may not be evaded. Before you act, if the top card of the blessings discard deck is not Blessing of the Gods, the difficulty of the check to defeat is increased by 6. After you act, if the check to defeat did not have the Swashbuckling trait, discard the top card of the blessings deck. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Addu is immune to the Fire and Poison traits. Before you act, each character at your location must succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 14 check or bury the top card of his deck. After you act, the Addue deals 1d4+1 Structural damage to your ship.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Bakekujira is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. Before you act, the Bakekujira deals 1d4 Combat damage to each character at your location. After you act, the Bakekujira deals 1d4+1 Structural damage to your ship.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Each character at your location must summon and encounter the Chelish Marine; if is defeated or undefeated based solely on your check. If the check to defeat has the Swashbuckling trait, the damage dealt by the Marine is increased by 4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Dweller in the Deeps is immune to the Acid and Poison traits, all damage dealt by it is Poison damage, and it may not be evaded. Before you act, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 15 check or you may not play spells that have the Attack trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: All damage from the Gargiya is Fire damage. If defeated, the Gargiya deals 1d8 Fire damage to each character at your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, each character must attempt a Wisdom 11 check. Each character that fails may not play weapons or spells in this encounter and, if at another location must move to this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, the Lusca deals 1d4+1 Structural damage to your ship. If undefeated, the Lusca deals damage to each character at your location; then each character at your location must succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 11 check or bury the top 1d4 cards of his deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, the Pirate Bomber deals 1d4 Fire damage to each character at your location. If the check to defeat does not have the Swashbuckling trait, after you act, the Pirate Bomber deals 1d4 Poison damage to each character at your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 14 check or the Pirate Sniper deals 1d4-1 Ranged Combat damage to you, then 1d4-1 Ranged Combat damage to you. If the check to defeat has the Ranged trait, add 1d8 to it. If the check to defeat does not have the Swashbuckling trait, you may not play allies on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Seaweed Siren is immune to the Mental trait. All damage dealt by it is Mental damage that may not be reduced. If undefeated, search your deck and discard any allies, then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, each other character must summon and encounter the henchman Drowning Devil, and you must summon and encounter the ship Abrogail's Fury. If your roll exceeds the difficulty of the check to defeat, you are dealt Force damage equal to the difference between the difficulty and the number you rolled.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Brinebones is immune to the Electricity, Mental, and Poison traits. Before you act, randomly choose an occupied location. Each character at that location must attempt a Dexterity or Acrobatics 14 check. Characters who succeed are dealt 2 Electricity damage; characters who fail are dealt 1d4+1 Electricity damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Captain Horrus Riptooth may not be evaded. Before you act, if the top card of the blessings discard pile is not Blessing of the Gods, the difficulty of the check to defeat is increased by 6. Before attempting each check, randomly choose another character at your location to recharge a card. The difficulty of the check to defeat Captain Horrus Riptooth is increased by that character's Strength die. Damage dealt by Captain Horrus Riptooth is also dealt to that character.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you aren't the only character at your location, a random character at your location takes Combat damage equal to the number of cards that have the Attack trait and weapons in your hand; then Hyapatia is evaded. If undefeated, Hyapatia deals no damage; instead, discard a number of cards equal to your hand size from the top of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If your check to defeat has the Ranged trait, the difficulty of the check to defeat is increased by 10. Before a character plays a card that has the Pirate or Swashbuckling trait in a check to defeat Kerdak Bonefist, that character must first recharge a card. Damage dealt by Kerdak Bonefist is dealt to all characters.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Magaav Commander is immune to the Fire and Poison traits. Before you act, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 15 check or you may not play spells with the Attack trait. If the Magaav Commander would be defeated, ignore the result and reroll the dice. The Magaav Commander is defeated or undefeated based solely on the result of the second die roll. If you would discard any cards due to damage from the Magaav Commander, bury them instead.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 15 check or Omara Culverin deals 1d4-1 Ranged Combat damage to you, then 1d4-1 Ranged Combat damage to you, then 1d4-1 Ranged Combat damage to you. If your check to defeat has the Ranged trait, add 1d8 to it. After you act, Omara Culverin deals 1d4 Ranged Combat damage to you.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, Powderpot deals 1d6 Fire damage to each character at your location. If defeated, a character of your choice at your location must succeed at a Craft 11 check or each character at your location must discard the top card of her deck and take 2d4 Fire damage. After you act, Powderpot deals 1d4 Poison damage to each character at a random occupied open location.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "We'll play a mournful dirge when you dance your last jig hanging from the yardarm. Right, Scurvy?" -- Sweetlips

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, Sweetlips and Scurvy does not deal damage; instead, banish a random card from your discard pile. Then add a random monster to a random open location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, Tsadok deals 1d4+1 Ranged Combat damage to 2 random characters at your location. If the check to defeat has the Arcane or Divine trait, its difficulty is increased by 5. After you act, Tsadok deals 1d4+1 Ranged Combat damage to 2 random characters at your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to explore your location. Add 3d6 to your combat checks during this exploration. Each character at your location buries a card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Bury this card to succeed at your non-combat check while on a ship. Discard this card to explore your location. Add the Swashbuckling trait to your combat checks during this exploration.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, bury this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 2d8+3 and add the Fire and Ranged traits; this counts as playing a weapon instead of an armor. Recharge this card to reduce Combat or Fire damage dealt to you by 3; if you are proficient with light armors, you may reveal this card instead, and you may play another armor on this check. If youa re proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat damage to you by 4, or to add 1 die to your Diplomacy check. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with heavy armors, bury this card instead. If you are proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to any check. Bury this card and all cards in your hand to succeed at your check to defeat a non-villain monster; then draw up to your hand size. Discard this card to explore your location. After you play this card, if it matches the top card of the blessings discard pile, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, banish this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 4d6. You may additionally discard another card to add your Craft skill; after playing that card, succeed at a Craft 17 check to recharge that card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Bury this card to recharge 1d4+1 spells from your discard pile; you must have a skill matching each spell's Arcane or Divine trait to recharge that spell. If you have the Arcane or Divine skill, after playing this card, bury another card to recharge this card instead of burying it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card and discard a spell to add 2d8 to any check by a character on a ship, or to evade a bane that has the Weather trait, or to banish a displayed bane that has the Weather trait. Reveal this card and discard a spell to search the blessings discard pile and choose a card to put on top.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d10+2. Add another 1d10 if the bane has the Human trait. Add another 1d6 if the bane has a power that deals damage before you act. If you are proficient with weapons, you may discard this card to add 1d4+1 to any combat check at another location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d6+2; you may additionally bury this card and up to 3 other cards to add 2d6 for each card you bury. If you did not bury this card, roll 1d6, or 1d12 if you are proficient with weapons, on a 1, or on a 1-4 if you buried any cards to add damage, shuffle this card into your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 6 to your check against a card that has the Aquatic, Pirate, or Swashbuckling trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card and choose a character to play a spell from his discard pile. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane or Divine 14 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card and choose one: your Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution skills are all 1d12+2, or your hand size is 3, 7, or 10. At the end of the scenario, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check or your check to defeat a ship, discard this card to use your Arcane or Divine skill + 4d6. If the bane is undefeated, shuffle the location deck it came from and place the bane on top. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 17 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to use your Wisdom or Divine skill + 1d8 + 1d10 + 1d12. After playing this card, if you do not have the Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at a Divine 16 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: At the end of any player's turn, discard this card to move any number of characters at your location to another location. Ignore any movement restrictions. For your combat check, discard this card to use your Arcane or Divine skill + 2d12. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 17 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d8+3; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d8. If a monster has a power that increases the difficulty of a combat check, ignore that power.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d10+1; you may additionally bury this card to add another 1d10. If you did not bury this card, roll 1d6, or 1d12 if you are proficient with weapons; on a 1, shuffle this card into your deck. If you are proficient with weapons, you may discard this card to add 2d4 to any combat check at another location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d8+3; you may additionally bury this card to add another 2d6. Shuffle this card into your deck to decrease the difficulty of a combat check by 2d4, or 1d4+4 if you have the Arcane skill.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 2d4+3; you may additionally discard this card to add another 2d4. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If any d4 rolled on this check is a 4, count it as a 5.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d10+2; you may additionally bury this card to add another 2d8 and the Fire trait. If you did not bury this card, roll 1d6, or 1d12 if you are proficient with weapons; on a 1, shuffle this card into your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d6+2; discard this card and 1 other card to add another 3d6. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If any d6 rolled on this check is a 6, count it as a 7.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 2d4+2; you may additionally discard this card to add another 3d4 and the Acid trait. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. You may recharge this card to add the Swashbuckling trait to or remove it from your check; this does not count as playing a weapon.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d8+1d12+2. Add another 1d4 if you are on a ship. If you fail this check, you may discard this card to ignore the result and reroll the dice. You must take the second result.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 1 Weapon 1 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 2 Ally 2 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, each character at this location must summon and encounter the henchman Draugr Captain.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Bury your discard pile.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, discard 1d4 cards from the blessings deck.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The island of Lucrehold guards Port Peril's harbor, not with cliffs and shallow straits, but with the bristling weapons of Fort Hazard. Home to the Hurricane King, Kerdak Bonefist, Fort Hazard is the de facto captiol of the Shackles--the seat of its most powerful ruler in the regions largest city. Those who hold Fort Hazard hold the Shackles. They do not relinquish their rulership easily.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 2 Weapon 1 Spell 0 Armor 1 Item 2 Ally 0 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, reveal a card that has the Pirate trait or you are dealt 1d4-1 Combat damage.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Banish a card that has the Pirate trait.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: If this location is occupied, the difficulty to defeat banes that have the Pirate trait at any location is decreased by 5.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The cliffs of this small island witness all comings and goings in Port Peril. The Hurricane King's personal fortress, Fort Hazard, looms here, while his ship, the Filthy Lucre, harbors at its docks.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: If this location is occupied, the difficulty to defeat banes that have the Pirate trait at any location is decreased by 5.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 6 Barrier 0 Weapon 0 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 0 Ally 3 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: The difficulty to defeat monsters is increased by 4.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Summon and defeat the henchman Ruffian, then summon and defeat the henchman Buccaneer.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Whenever treasure is at stake, pirates face the temptations of robbery, treachery, and murder. Thugs lure their unwilling victims to isolated locales like this one. Driven by greed, they swiftly dispatch their former companions… or abandon them in subterranean chambers swarming with ravenous monsters. All too often, the bodies are never found.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 0 Weapon 0 Spell 3 Armor 0 Item 0 Ally 1 Blessing 3

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Your checks have the Pirate or Swashbuckling trait.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at Wisdom or Divine 9 check, or banish a card.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may banish a card that has the Pirate or Swashbuckling trait to recharge 2d4 cards in your discard pile that has the Divine trait.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A statue of a fierce woman with an eye patch and a cutlass watches over an altar of brine colored-stone. Obedient, sculpted tentacles seem to writhe in the flickering light of emerald candles.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may banish a card that has the Pirate or Swashbuckling trait to recharge 2d4 cards in your discard pile that has the Divine trait.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 6

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, recharge 1d4 random cards from your hand.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Reduce Structural damage to this ship by 3. You may discard a card from the blessings deck to add 1d12 to your check to defeat a bane or ship.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 6

property.name: Flavour
property.value: This black-hulled man-o'-war is the flagship of the Chelish armada. Admiral Thrune surrounds her four-master with magaavs and warships, knowing the back of the Empire will never be broken.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Reduce structural damage to this ship by 1. Remove the Swashbuckling trait from all of your checks.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 7

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If any check to defeat has the Swashbuckling trait, add 2 to it.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Reduce structural damage to this ship by 3. You may discard a card from the blessings deck to automatically succeed at your check to acquire a boon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 7

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Minted the Rock Bottom until a darkling encounter with the ghost ship Noiegoul, Kerdak Bonefist's man-o'-war is fitted with 16 baleful cannons and a crew of reavers worthy of the Hurricane King.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, summon and encounter the henchman Wereshark Pirate. Reduce Structural damage to this ship by 2.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Cheliax's tolerance for the Shackles' piracy has come to a dramatic end. The diabolical empire has long sown discord among pirates, but the time for subtlety is over. The Chelish navy is sailing for the lawless isles, ready to scour them of the pirate menace once and for all. If the Shackles' pirates are to survive, they must unite as they never have before--but cooperation isn't in a pirate's nature. They'll need to rally behind leaders who have proven their worth, their ruthlessness, and their ability to fulfill promise of plunder!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Danse Magaav The Armada Storming Fort Hazard Inside Lucrehold Last Stand of the Hurricane King

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a card feat. Gain a Class 7 ship feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The rumored Chelish invasion has arrived! As a fleet of pirate-hunting warships approaches the Shackles, the vanguard of that diabolical nation soars into view: a flight of flying devils known as magaavs. Fend off an assault from the skies!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Fringes of the Eye Tempest Cay Shark Island Floating Shipyard Holy Isle Fog Bank Cannibal Isle Lonely Island

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When any character encounters a Magaav Assassin henchman, 1 character at each other open location must summon and encounter a Magaav Assassin.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Magaav Commander

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Magaav Assassins

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a skill feat.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The sea caves of Lucrehold wind their way beneath Fort Hazard, paving the way to the Hurricane King's inner sanctum. But even the pirate lord's fallen allies rise to defend their captain. They now take their commands from his bloodthirsty first mate, Tsadok Goldtooth.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Lucrehold Sea Caves Shrine to Besmara Docks Harbor Sea Fort Chapel Murder Hole

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Your ship is anchored at Lucrehold

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Shuffle the villain Brinebones into the blessings deck. When you discard Brinebones from the blessings deck, a random character summons and encounters it; then advance the blessings deck and shuffle Brinebones into the blessings deck. If there are no blessings in the blessings deck, you lose the scenario.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Tsadok Goldtooth

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Draugr Captains

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a power feat. Loot: Doubleshot Pepperbox

card.name: Last Stand of the Hurricane King

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Kerdak Bonefist, the Hurricane King, wants to escape aboard his ship, the Filthy Lucre. Chase him down, slaughter all those foolish enough to defend him, and finally put an end to his vicious reign. The Shackles have chosen a new leader, it's time to claim the Hurricane Crown!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Fort Hazard Lucrehold Shrine to Besmara Sea Caves Sea Fort House of Stolen Kisses Docks Beach

alternate.name: Last Stand of the Hurricane King

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you defeat a villain, it does not escape; instead, put it in a villain pile. Unless all other villains are in the villain pile, if you would encounter Kerdak Bonefist, summon and encounter the Filthy Lucre instead; Kerdak Bonefist is undefeated.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Kerdak Bonefist Hyapatia Omara Culverin Powderpot Sweetlips and Scurvy Tsadok Goldtooth Captain Horrus Riptooth Brinebones

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: The Hurricane Crown

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Cheliax is defeated! With a fleet at your command and your reputation soaring, the time is right to sail back to Port Peril. Now you can lay siege to Fort Hazard, home of the Shackles' leader, the Hurricane King himself! But the most feared pirate isn't without his allies...

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Coastline Fort Hazard Murder Hole Sea Caves Shrine to Besmara Beach Tower Seaside Warehouse

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Your ship is anchored at the Coastline.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When any character encounters a monster with the Lycanthrope trait, each other character at that location summons and encounters the henchman Hammerhead Shark. When you defeat a monster with the Pirate trait, stash a plunder card.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Captain Horrus Riptooth

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Cannon Golem Wereshark Pirates

property.name: Attr4
property.value: For each plunder card, gain another random card of that type from the box.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The Chelish armada begins its attack! Admiral Druvalia Thrune is a merciless commander with the might of Cheliax's nearly invincible navy at her command. Prove your mettle against one of the deadliest fleets on the waves, or you'll see the Shackles fall to the devilish invaders!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Cannibal Isle Scar Bay Pinnacle Atoll Lonely Island Fringed of the Eye Raker Shoals Shark Island Coastline

property.name: Attr1
property.value: After you place your party's ship, make a fleet stack using 4 other ships that have been checked off on your fleet card. Add 1d4 to your check to defeat a ship for each card in the fleet stack. When you encounter a ship, summon but do not encounter 1d4+1 ships. The difficulty to defeat the original ship is increased by the total of the classes of the summoned ships. If you fail a check to defeat a ship, banish a ship from your fleet stack; if you can't, you lose the scenario.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Admiral Druvalia Thrune

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Paralictor Valeria Asperixus Chelish Marine Captains

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character draws a random non-Basic, non-Elite weapon from the box. Gain a Class 6 ship feat. Loot: Crossbow of Retribution
